title: Glass, ca. 1980
dimensions: Overall: 9.8 x 8.5 cm diameter (3 7/8 x 3 3/8 in.)
description: Bottle green glass.  Decorated with three vertical pyramid-shaped piercing at top and three horizontal semi-circular ridges at bottoms fitted for finger placement

tombstone.epitaph:
Glass, ca. 1980.
ca. 1980. Glass. Gift of Mel Byars. 1991-59-166.
